## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b944051826f01c581baeba101564a1e463b08dc5ba4353b9598eff67ebddc9f2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'diskho' @ 999.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
